snippet.title: Dead Effect 2 VR Trailer
snippet.description:
The official VR Trailer for Dead Effect 2 VR.

Dead Effect 2 VR is comming out on Steam in Early Access. Get ready now! We are almost there!

For more information and the latest news about the game:

visit our official DE2 page ►http://deadeffect2.com/
visit our official BFI page ►http://badflyinteractive.com/
like us on Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/DeadEffectGame/
follow us on Twitter ►https://twitter.com/DeadEffectGame
follow us on Pinterest ► https://www.pinterest.com/badfly/
follow us on Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/badflyinteractive//badfly/
